title: New free champion rotation: Bard, Galio, Graves and more!

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there will be no new episode of A Corporate Matter this week. My apologies to anyone who was excited for a new one.

See you next week.

you guys can believe me or not but free dreadknight {{champion:86}} from woobox.com/scrx56 all you need to do is follow the page on twitter and it gives you the code to get it for free I'm silver 3 and you can try to message me to see if I am a robot or not
bot as we all know that dreadknight garen is free its the twitter skin like how riot girl trist is the facebook one

and unchained alistar is the youtube one.
for some reason im still not getting it yet D:

If you paste a specific message into the technical support description and fill out all the rest of your information, unchained Alistar is automatically deposited into your account along with the champion itself. I did it a month ago.
Some of the old codes no longer work.  Just send an email with a screenshot of the code you got to player support, and they should unlock the skin for you.
:3 I'm not a bot tho... rip
but everyone knows that, that is the twitter skin so its not new news at all
robot
K I'm a robot Yeet
no you're just a retard

**BEYOND THE VOID: UPDATE 7/4/16**

The second season of Beyond the Void will begin in October. Until then, there will be a mini-series taking place during the season finale of Beyond the Void. It will be focusing on what happened to cities such as Zaun and Piltover before and after the ice reached them. 
I know the mini-series sounds pretty boring, but it will turn out to be more entertaining than the summary I just gave (The summary was to give you guys a rough outline).  

The mini-series will have 6 episodes in its first season and will begin in a few weeks (probably the last Monday of July).

Thank you for being so patient and have a great fourth of July!
Good luck writing. I'll keep an eye out.
Pity. Keep up the good work though!
aww man :(
How is Teemo's difficulty so high? You just press R + E to win.
Because if you press R and E all you do is throw a shroom and turn off your poison.
its not a toggle
Yeah, you can't even press e
I was attempting to make a joke.

The difficulty meters are usually inaccurate. 
According to them, {{champion:77}} is more difficult to play than {{champion:64}} .
but, that's kinda true though.....
You are really really really really REALLY dumb if you think udyr is harder than Lee Sin .

Play Teemo, expect 5 man ganks with sweeper alterations, and die. Teemo's difficulty IS high. Unless they leave you alone and then you actually get to do something. Teemo isn't really that good right now due to a lot of true sight things going around. Sweeper Alteration even DISABLES your shrooms. Though if you play Nashor's Guinsoos Wit's End Teemo, you might can expect some fun things, depending on the matchup and how far you can get before you get put behind.
R+Q= {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Is the new champion free already? {{champion:3}}
I want{{champion:85}}
Thresh AND Brad on the same rotation? Bunny Fufuu week confirmed.
These are both my mains too xD

so are tristana and alistar. i dont know why though

Because you can get them for free through liking rito's facebook page and subscribing to league of legends' youtube channel. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
RITO please... Just make Urf a regular game mode and for your weekend play  "All for Urf" or "HexaUrf for One"  6 on 6 Urf all for one.  Call it "The Gauntlet"
no one here should play teemo in champion rotation
to bad, already main him
Weird question here, but is there a reason Wukong is right after Yi? If it's alphabetical, shouldn't Wukong be at the bottom?
He's put in as though his name is "Monkey King" rather than Wukong.  I think it's a bit of an old joke that they did.
support mains are gonna be happy just like me. ty {{champion:432}} {{champion:412}}

Bard main here. It'll be interesting to see how many times he gets sniped from me, then to see how terrible they are xD. At least thresh is my second main, and he'll make any bard cry. But the other fun thing will be seeing free thresh's who miss every q and don't know how to use their ult

Riot! Plz give us our Darius and Jayce in the rotation already! If teemo has made it, why hasn't darius? 
Love
, me

People better not be surprised when they see {{champion:17}} bot lane this week.

There'll either be a bunch of frustrated {{champion:104}} adcs last-hitting or no one but {{champion:17}} to viably farm vs {{champion:222}} on the free-rotation.
And the rise of non-AA based champs top...

yeah.  At least this week has a half decent mix for ARAM.  Last week was really crappy.
Especially when {{champion:22}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:42}} ended up on the same team; which happened far too often for my tastes.
Please have Ahri in the next rotation{{champion:103}}
